review: Wow, unexpectedly some of the the best Lebanese I‚Äôve had outside of the Middle East! The fresh & hot manoushe was so delicious and spices are imported straight from Lebanon. The service was excellent, our hosts were so relaxed, helpful & kind. The beef kebabs...with pomegranate sauce was excellent and I will definitely be back before I lea with pomegranate sauce was excellent and I will definitely be back before I leave!
Delicious food and wonderful staff to boot. What could be better? They even brought us a delicious Tea to finish our Meal.

Best Lebanese in Sri Lanka!! Everything was tasty and the personal excepcional. 
The shrimp salad and the falafel were super tasty!

Amazing place with a lovely owner , Stuff are amazing and very helpful
The food was soo delicious and tasty
Thank you fir great hospitality

This was a terrible experience, i think they don't know anything about restaurants and food.
We ordered salads hummus and several main course, all came late and first came the main course . The chicken was overcooked with tones of herbs. The hummus was watery...and miled . You could buy hummus in a supermarket which is much better than that. We ordered fajita , in the menu it said it come on a pita, but end up coming as a sandwich a very bad one .
Salad was salty and not fresh. 
Overall the place is not clean service is bad food is poor I wouldn't recommend ot AT A and miled . You could buy hummus in a supermarket which is much better than that. We ordered fajita , in the menu it said it come on a pita, but end up coming as a sandwich a very bad one .
Salad was salty and not fresh. 
Overall the place is not clean service is bad food is poor I wouldn't recommend ot AT ALL.
During our short visit in Weligama we went three times to this amazing place. The food is delicious and the people who work there are just the best.

Best Lebanese food that I tried ever. From the hummus to the falafel, everything I tried was delicious and homemade. Amazing environment, nice music and very good service. Also the shisha is one of the best I smoked so far. This is the one you...must go when in the sou must go when in the south!

Very good food in Weligama! Tasty baba ganoush and zatar. Nice ambience.
Friendly and helpful staff. Shisha is also quite nice

The best baba ghannoush we've ever had. The owner was there and he was so kind. The service was incredible. This place is a must if you're in Sri Lanka do what you have to do to get the food here. It's incredible.

The best shisha & service in town! The staff are amazing & the food is delicious and fresh! Falafel plate was cooked with love and  so so tasty~ honestly never experienced such good service and passion! Thank you so so much for a great night...will be bac will be back ü§ç
Deliciousssss food. The best falafel and hummus. The staff was so lovely and did extra service, my friend had bday and they really created a good atmosphere.
Best place around with nice atmosphere and good service.. which is difficult to find ) tasty food and friendly people ‚ù§Ô∏è my daughter is crazy about chocolate salami with fruits üòã

This place has an easy vibe and a happy feel to it that goes well with the delicious, fresh and authentic food. 
We tried the Shakshuka, Hummus and topped it off like a cherry on a cake with some yummy biscuit dessert and tea. This...with the chilled friendly banter from the host perfectly put a smile on my face again with the chilled friendly banter from the host perfectly put a smile on my face again :)

Amazing food and service! Best Lebanese food I have tried. Recommend the wraps and chips.

Great shisha aswell!!!

Really nice atmosphere and friendly staff. Food was lovely, I would recommend the falafel! 
We were served Sri Lankan black tea after our meal which was such a nice addition to a great lunch.
Friendly staff and delicious burgers! Banger views from the restaurant to the ocean! Will come again if visiting Sri Lanka!

Lovely food and coffee, incredible view. Definitely come and try. We have been repeatedly since being in Weligama. 
Recommend the avo eggs

Scenic Rooftop is a cool caf√© on top of a hotel in Weligama, Sri Lanka. It's a great place to feel the island vibe and relax in comfort. They serve really good local food mixed with some European dishes. The views are awesome‚Äîyou can see...the ocean and lots of green plants. It's a beautiful spot to eat and have a good ti the ocean and lots of green plants. It's a beautiful spot to eat and have a good time.
Had breakfast here in the rooftop cafe. We had a lovely view, lovely atmosphere and excellent service! Absolut recommendation!
Nice place ! Great view, great service, great good, and the best Latte in Sri Lanka ! This is a really nice menu with a lot of choices.
Nice view at the rooftop, very decent coffee and WiFi good enough for some basic remotely working stuff. Would recommend.
Great view and delicious food! Nice flavors and a bit spicy just like I prefer (had the chicken taco). Nice staff and very good service. A hip place that I recommend!
Nice food, with a view. Hade a bbq tacos, which was very good. Nice drinks with a view. The staff are very friendly and welcoming.

Very nice service, friendly staff, amazing rooftop view and delicious food! (We had linguine, falafel and shrimp wraps and poke bowl) 
Reasonable prize. 
Ah and don't forget the super good cocktails!
Amazing service and food! The scenic iced coffee is a must try! Great view from roof top, with fab atmosphere! Will definitely be back!
Lovely staff lovely food and lovely people I had the brownie it was delicious and a good choice of smoothies with some good coffee also
Great juice, a good atmosphere, good people. A really good view from the rooftop and I love the music and the clothes shop
We came here for lunch with friends. It turned out to be a great place and also it had a beautiful sea viewüòç would definitely come back!
Really helpfull for a take away in the eveving. The view is really nice also the staff is really nice
Very tasty and nice view over Weligama Beach and Jungle. Friendly personal. Nice place to chill out and quite also. Decoration lovely

We had two excenlent Pizzas! We are already the second time here and the quality was as good as the first time. üëçüëç

I liked also that they gave us cards for playing while we were waiting for the pizzas. But the waiting time was...still very fine. 

So come and enjoy still very fine. 

So come and enjoy!üëçüëç
Quick service and delicious pizza! Fresh ingredients, clean dining area and cold drinks. Will definetely come back!!
Fantastic pizza, i had the glutenfree Pizza and my husband the Chefs special and both where amazing! Service is also very friendly, we will be back :)
It s all about the Pizza . If you re craving a good pizza while in Weligama,  try the Pizza Hub ! It s a simple place but the pizza and also the service  is good . We will surely visit again !
Best pizza in town and good prices! One margarita for 1500. Would absolutely recommend. Great location and good service

Delicious vegetarian pizzas And very nice people. We can fully recommend this place. 
They also have nice coffe here!!!
Really good mushroom pasta and the pizza looked amazing! Cozy place, nice and friendly staff! They gave us playing cards while we waited for the food! Recommend
Amazing pizza, amazing atmosphere and amazing staff. I just enjoyed every moment i was here. Highly recommend for everyone to eat here at least once!!!

This spot serves great pizza and pasta. I had honestly walked in here expecting to be disappointed based on the other Italian food I‚Äôve eaten in Sri Lanka, and was pleasantly surprised by the pizza and pasta. We ordered the fungi pizza and verdura pasta....The pizza crust was great, Neapolitan style, and pasta was delicious. It‚Äôs Italian food with a local twi The pizza crust was great, Neapolitan style, and pasta was delicious. It‚Äôs Italian food with a local twist.

I rarely write reviews for pizza places but make an exception as the service was 11/10

Our sons were a little over local cuisine and the pizza was a great compromise 

They delivered to our hotel was a very modest tip

Sincerest thanks
The Pizza is delicious. The food is served quickly and the waiters are very friendly. Can recommend this place!
The pizza was really delicious and the staff really kind and friendly. Would recommend it for sure!! (:

The best pizza in weligama! If you are craving some Italian food this is the place to go they also serve pasta. Wood fired pizza prepared with love and and fresh ingredients at reasonable price and no service charge. Staff is super friendly and the...boss is just absolute sweetheart making pizzas himself. Nice and cozy atmosphere not far from the beach. Sometimes gets busy so it‚Äôs great that there is also a take away option or even delivery. Highly recomme boss is just absolute sweetheart making pizzas himself. Nice and cozy atmosphere not far from the beach. Sometimes gets busy so it‚Äôs great that there is also a take away option or even delivery. Highly recommend.
This pizza restaurant is amazing. The owner learned how to make pizza from a Italien guy. I can truly recommend this place

Very delicious and big size pizza. Lovely staff and great location. 
You can also watch trains passing b6 which is very nice!
Friendly staff and delicious burgers! Banger views from the restaurant to the ocean! Will come again if visiting Sri Lanka!

Lovely food and coffee, incredible view. Definitely come and try. We have been repeatedly since being in Weligama. 
Recommend the avo eggs
